assetProfile.address2: 11th Floor, B Wing Senapati Bapat Marg Lower Parel
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Repro India Limited provides printing solutions in India and internationally. It prints magazines and other periodicals, books and brochures, maps, atlases, posters, etc. The company also provides value engineering, creative designing, pre-press, printing, post-press, knitting and assembly, warehousing, dispatch, database management, sourcing and procurement, localization, and web based services. In addition, it offers physical book distribution, print on demand, offset printing, and digital services. Repro India Limited was founded in 1990 and is based in Mumbai, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Mukesh Rajnikant Dhruve
